column2: Choose to become a mage or not.
Risk your life on a quest to improve your ability as a mage or to find treasure!
Learn to master the stealthy power of air!
Learn to master the summoning powers of earth!
Learn to master the destructive power of fire!
Learn to master the manipulating power of water!
The target will be magically cursed with a deadly spell!
Cure target of wounds and most illnesses!
Cure target of wounds and most illnesses!
Start a new life by taking the targets titles and abdicating your titles to the target!
Plague the target with a terrible sickness!
Bestow the gift of immortality to this mortal!
Revoke the gift of immortality for this immortal!
Revoke the gift of immortality for this immortal!
Place a magical protection around this person.
Revoke magical protection on this person.
This mortal will turn into an undead lich king.
Removes the power of a lich king.
Heal the mind of this person.
Heal the mind of this person.
Use divine powers to teleport this person out of prison!
Use divine powers to teleport this person out of prison!
Use divine powers to teleport this person to your court!
Perform a powerful healing spell for all issues on the character.
